channel.title: software on Philomath's Lair!
channel.description: Recent content in software on Philomath's Lair!

item.title: Mutt Mutt, who?
item.description: in this series, i will share about mutt, a terminal based email client, quite popular among command line heroes and open source purists, who prefer text emails over any html emails. All email client sucks! This one sucks less! To know more how email system works in reality, in bits and bytes, read about the digital pigeon! mutt isync msmtp rbsync New contender is Aerc. In draft since october 16, 2018

item.title: The Digital Pigeon
item.description: Ever wonder how To know more how email system works in reality, in bits and bytes, read about the digital pigeon! Thanks to sayan at making these concepts more palpable at Pycon India 2018. if you also wonder about how things work, you might like my other blogs on the same. How dns works? How Internet works How linux boots How encryption works? It’s just multiplexing

item.title: What is your PASS-word?
item.description: Ever been frustated remembering so many password for so many services you signed up for, and sometimes only for one time use? If yes, this blog post will change your situation, as it did for me. Before Single sign on using third party services leading that entity total control about and knowledge about my presence everywhere. Using same and weak passwords everywhere, with minor difference which adds to the threat analysis.
